# PKPaymentSummaryItemType.final

**Case**

A summary item that represents a known, final cost.

## Declaration

```swift
case final
```

## Payment summary item types

- **PKPaymentSummaryItemType.pending**: A summary item that represents an estimated or unknown cost.

items.description: A summary item that represents an estimated or unknown cost.
items.name: PKPaymentSummaryItemType.pending
